the garden

Newledo is giving space to this awesome community project.
The Garden is an organic garden powered by community members who are passionate about growing healthy foods, beautiful flowers and practicing sustainability together. They encourage families without gardening space at home to join them in growing so all can share in the bounty together and share with those in need! They'll be incorporating gardening and learning with events teaching fermentation, canning, basket weaving, foraging, herbal medicine and even baking and cake decorating!

If this sounds like something you would like to be a part of, please reach out, grangegarden88@gmail.com

For more info please join us on Facebook at “The Garden at Newledo” for updates, upcoming events and garden building days

See you in the garden!
